rubèn espinosa was a mexican photojournalist he was found dead of gunshot wounds in mexico city his body bearing signs of torture
rubèn was working on a corruption story he fled his hometown veracruz because he was being threatened family last heard from him on friday
the body of rubèn espinosa was identified on saturday in the same apartment in mexico city 4 women were also found slain
rubèn espinosa worked for investigative magazine proceso he was the 7th journalist killed this year in #mexico the 11th one since 2010
rubèn espinosa colleagues organised strong protests in mexico city and veracruz photo dario lopez mills ap
here photographers laid down their cameras in tribute to rubèn espinosa on sunday photo karlo reyes demotix
while this is from the protest that was organised in rubèn espinosas town veracruz photo jan xahuentitla demotix
the magazine proceso for which espinosa worked recalls the threats he received and asks for inquiry into his death
i dont trust any state institution i dont trust the government i fear for my companions i fear for myself
if you want to know some of rubèn espinosas photos here is his instagram #mexico

livestream of the #theatershooting verdict
the jury is being brought into the room this phase of the sentencing determines whether james holmes will face death
so far in each count the jury has found the mitigating factors dont outweigh aggravating factors in this phase
now the case moves to the third phase where the jury will decide between life without parole or death for james holmes in #theatershooting
in the third phase of #theatershooting sentencing loved ones of victims will be allowed to testify on how the shooting impacted them
a @denverpost rundown on what happened in the second phase of sentencing in #theatershooting sentencing
this verdict means that the death penalty is a possibility for james holmes in #theatershooting life without parole is the other option

in #brazil @amnesty has released a report claiming brazilian police kill too many and are rarely investigated
